p.d: Camille Thomas With her two sisters and Caroline Veyt, the cellist Camille Thomas looks back over her career from her earliest years to the release of her first record, symbol of an exceptional success. From Royan to Brussels, via Berlin and Bordeaux, her precious Gagliano dating from 1788 never leaves her side! Directed by: Thierry Loreau, Pierre Barr√© (season 3, Belgium, 2018).
